data.title: Trump’s tough stance on China: Spillover effects on Cambodia - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia, seen as a country that helps China re-route its exports to the US, fears being caught in Trump 2.0 trade reprisals, says Cambodian researcher Sokvy Rim.

data.title: Veteran Cambodian journalist dies of gunshot wounds - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Suspect arrested after Chhoeung Chheng shot while covering illegal logging.

data.title: Cambodia: A war-torn country that became China’s firm ally in Southeast Asia - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: While most Southeast Asian countries have stressed they will not take sides between China and the US, Cambodia — a steadfast strategic ally of China in Southeast Asia — is the exception.

data.title: Cambodian journalist investigating illegal logging shot - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Veteran reporter Chhoeung Chheung, 63, was shot in the abdomen. Police arrested a suspect, but claims the attack was due to a "personal dispute" rather than the journalist’s ongoing investigations.

data.title: Cambodian genocide survivors still healing from 50 years of trauma - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Nearly half a century after Pol Pot’s Khmer Rouge regime murdered at least 2 million people in Cambodia – a quarter of the country’s population – fresh terror lingers in the bodies, minds, and even the dreams of survivors.

data.title: Cambodia Deportations Undermine Thailand’s UN Human Rights Council Credentials - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Thailand is becoming increasingly inhospitable to dissidents and anti-government activists from neighboring countries.

data.title: The murky waters of Cambodia’s Funan Techo Canal - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: A 180-kilometre waterway to criss-cross the country, but who pays?

data.title: Partnership of convenience: Ream Naval Base and the Cambodia–China convergence - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: While China is pouring resources into Ream Naval Base, the West must continue to engage Phnom Penh to counter Beijing’s influence in the kingdom.

data.title: Location, location, location: Why Ream Naval Base is not the real estate China needed - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Artificial islands in the South China Sea have more strategic value than a backwater base.

data.title: 13 Filipinas get 2-yr sentence in Cambodia for violating surrogacy ban - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Thirteen Filipino women were meted a four-year sentence, eventually reduced to two, in Cambodia for violating the surrogacy ban in the country.

data.title: Cambodia jails 13 pregnant Filipino surrogates - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Thirteen women from the Philippines have been convicted of human trafficking in Cambodia for intending to sell babies they carried through surrogacy.

data.title: Southeast Asian lawmakers condemn deportation of Cambodian activists - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: A group of progressive lawmakers from different legislatures in Southeast Asia condemned the deportation of Cambodian human rights activists from Thailand.

data.title: Charting Its Discourse: Cambodia’s Naval Vessel Acquisitions from China - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Rather than look a gift horse in the mouth, observers should consider Cambodian agency instead of assuming Cambodia is a pliant recipient of Chinese military aid.

data.title: The Release of Mech Dara: Speaking Truth to Power - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Strong international pressure plus U.S. concessions have forced the hand of a the country’s kleptocratic elite.

data.title: Hun Manet leads Cambodia out of Vietnam’s shadow - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia’s withdrawal from the 25-year-old Cambodia-Laos-Vietnam Development Triangle Area (CLV-DTA) framework signals a more assertive Cambodian foreign policy and portends a sharp decline in relations with Vietnam.

data.title: Nobel Prize-Winning Research Highlights Cambodia’s History of Extractive Institutions - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: The work of Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson, and James Robinson can help explain the government’s collusion in criminal activities like cyber-scams.

data.title: For Cambodian refugee family in RI, first Thanksgiving a chance to be grateful for freedom - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Menghong Phly and his family fled political persecution in Cambodia.

data.title: China-Cambodia effort nets 240 Chinese suspects in anti-fraud campaign - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: China repatriated 240 arrested Chinese gambling and fraud suspects from Cambodia on Thursday, with some 500 more expected to be escorted back.

data.title: Veteran Cambodian Former Foreign Minister Sokhonn Set To Return To His Post - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Prime Minister Hun Manet reappointed veteran politician Prak Sokhonn as the new Minister of Foreign Affairs to steer Cambodia’s foreign policy, reported Fresh News.

data.title: Veteran Cambodian Former Foreign Minister Sokhonn Set To Return To His Post - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Prime Minister Hun Manet reappointed veteran politician Prak Sokhonn as the new Minister of Foreign Affairs to steer Cambodia’s foreign policy, reported Fresh News.

data.title: An Outpost in Cambodia Isn’t a Game-Changer for China’s Navy - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia insists Ream is not a Chinese overseas base, pointing to its constitutional prohibition on the permanent stationing of foreign troops in the country to back up its claim.

data.title: Survivors, sniffing dogs join anti-mine march at Cambodia's Angkor Wat - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Survivors and sniffing dogs joined hundreds of people at Cambodia's Angkor Wat on Sunday for a march against landmines after the US decision to send anti-personnel mines to Ukraine.

data.title: Cambodia jails another dissident for two years - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Ny Nak convicted for a Facebook post that questioned a land allocation.
